text: Şekerpare is a 1983 Turkish comedy movie. It was directed by Atıf Yılmaz. == Cast == * İlyas Salman - Cumali * Şener Şen - Ziver Bey * Yaprak Özdemiroğlu - Sekerpare * Ayşen Gruda - Peyker * Şevket Altuğ - Hursit * Neriman Köksal - Letafet * - Afet * - Galatali * Serra Yılmaz - Mahmure * Ayten Erman - Hamdune * - Nazir == References == == Other websites == * Category:1983 adventure movies Category:Turkish movies Category:Movies directed by Atıf Yılmaz
title: Şekerpare (movie)
